flawed_nl_solution:
The second day Richard walks 20/2-6 = <<20/2-6=4>>4 miles.
Richard walks 20+4+10 = <<20+4+10=34>>34 total miles.
Richard has 70-34 = <<70-34=40>>40 miles further to walk to be in New York City.
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 40. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
